attributes.action: Let people choose which day they want to celebrate christmas
attributes.additional_details: Most emergency services work christmas day and the hear theyve had working through the whole pandemic they should be allowed to have a day with their families if working christmas day. This would also benefit split oarents who alternate there christmas days to allow them to have their christmas day on either of the other days so children get their christmas with both parents. Narrowing the rules to only christmas day is inhumane for the likes of people that work christmas day
attributes.background: Change the rules from only celebrating christmas day to let families choose which day they celebrate out of the 3 festive days : christmas eve, christmas day, boxing day

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564244
